#summary Project Roadmap

This is a tentative list of features planned for future releases. This list is always evolving, so if there are features that aren't on the list [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-cal/issues/list add them as a feature request and vote].  

== Version 0.9.1 ==

  * Add drag drop support in the `DayView`
  * Add resize support in the `DayView` (<font color='green' size='1.5'>in trunk</font>)
  * Unit tests to support the `DayView`

== Version 0.9.2 ==

  * Add support for Gwt 2.0

== Version 0.9.3 ==

  * Support for direct JS integration via gwt-exporter

== Version 1.0.x ==

  * Add support for Recurring Appointments
  * Add an `AgendaView`
  * Differentiate between `AllDay` vs. `MultiDay` appointments in the `DayView`
